column1: All you need to know before you embark on the adventure of your life
WELCOME

A warm welcome to our International Guide - that has been especially written with you in mind. The Guide should contain all the information you feel is important before embarking on the adventure of your life! If you can't find the answer to your question please email our international student advisor or use our Got a Question page.

Studying abroad is one of the most exciting things you can do. You will not only learn academically but culturally and socially. All of these new experiences will transfer themselves into great life skills - no matter what subject you choose to study. International students are given a really warm reception not only at the university but also in Dundee City
column2: that welcomes and celebrates diverse cultures.

column1: We have no doubt that moving from school
column3: home and family or the world of work to university will be both an exciting and daunting experience
column4: involving considerable changes for you. We are aware that the lead up to coming to Scotland and your first few days in the university may feel a little bewildering but don't worry our orientation programme will help settle any homesickness you have. Don't forget your family and friends will be just as excited but will also worry about you travelling so far from home so make sure you give them a copy of your travel plans and the address of your accommodation.
